channel.title: CVE Feed for nlemsieh -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nlemsieh -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8667|2024-10-24T18:40:47.563Z -- nlemsieh -- hurrytimer%20%E2%80%93%20an%20scarcity%20and%20urgency%20countdown%20timer%20for%20wordpress%20%26%20woocommerce
item.description: The HurryTimer – An Scarcity and Urgency Countdown Timer for WordPress & WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized post publication due to a missing capability check on the activateCampaign() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.10.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to publish arbitrary posts like ones they have submitted for review, or a site administrator has in draft.

item.title: CVE-2024-8667|2024-10-24T07:35:56.502Z -- nlemsieh -- hurrytimer%20%E2%80%93%20an%20scarcity%20and%20urgency%20countdown%20timer%20for%20wordpress%20%26%20woocommerce
item.description: The HurryTimer – An Scarcity and Urgency Countdown Timer for WordPress & WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized post publication due to a missing capability check on the activateCampaign() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.10.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to publish arbitrary posts like ones they have submitted for review, or a site administrator has in draft.
